title: LF Coach and Plat+ players

embed.description: Check out the Sanguine community on Discord - hang out with 63 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Looking for an experienced coach willing to help improve our Diamond+ Knights team. 

Requirements;
- Diamond+ Elo
- Previous Experience

Also looking for players to join our Archers team.

Requirements
- Platinum+ Elo
- Strong communication (in game and out)
- Untiltable
- Can play at least 2 scrims a week.

Join our discord to trial :)
